    • Vlad Bibire

    About

    "...just me, myself and I"

    Hello. Vlad is a Web Developer & Graphic Designer based in Southampton, UK

    With over 5 years experience as a Graphic Designer and over 2 years as a Web Developer, I can confidently say that my current goal is to inspire people to embrace their passion and make a living out of it.

    Being involved in a lot of real-world projects, such as creating and selling Premium Websites Themes, or using freelancing as a way of living, I consired myself a profficient when it comes to Adobe Suite and also Web Technologyes because they are in fact the heart of my PSD Templates.
